data_meta.titleEn: Requesting To Take Leftover Food Home at a Restaurant
data_meta.titleKo: Requesting To Take Leftover Food Home at a Restaurant

sentences.speaker: Jack
sentences.sentence: "Excuse me, I couldn't finish my meal.

sentences.speaker: Jack
sentences.sentence: Can I take the rest home?"

sentences.speaker: Lucy
sentences.sentence: Of course! Let me pack it up for you.

sentences.speaker: Jack
sentences.sentence: Thank you. How long do you think it will take?

sentences.speaker: Lucy
sentences.sentence: I'll bring it to your table when it's ready."

expressions.desc: 대화에서 Jack는 '가져가다'라는 표현을 사용하여 남은 음식을 집으로 가져가려는 의도를 나타냈습니다.
expressions.example_en: I have a lot of work to do, so I decided to take home the report and work on it there.
expressions.example_ko: 제가 할 일이 많아서, 보고서를 가져와서 집에서 작업하기로 결정했습니다.
